title: Selma Blair Shares Revealing Photo After Chemotherapy Treatment
text:
Selma Blair showed off a very intimate photo of herself amid her battle with MS, and although most fans are supporting the star's decision to be real, many are criticizing the artistic inspiration behind her photo.

The "Cruel Intentions" star took to Instagram on Saturday and shared a photo of herself, bottomless, standing in front of a mirror while wearing a retro sweater and holding a crab-shaped purse over her nether region.

"Portrait of a lady," the star captioned the shot while tagging fashion designer Thom Browne.

Blair's smooth backside is on display, and paired with the smoothness of her bald head makes for a strikingly beautiful photo that has gained the praise of many fans and celebs.

Christina Milian commented, "I adore you!" while "Modern Family" star Sarah Hyland wrote a string of smiling emojis.

Model Jaime King couldn't help but give a cheeky response, writing, "I love you cutie booty."

Even Blair's BFF and "Cruel Intentions" co-star, Sarah Michelle Gellar, got in on the action, jokingly writing, "You know they have medicine for that."

Gellar was referring to the positioning of Blair's giant crab.
